channel.title: CVE Feed for YITH -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for YITH -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-34385|2024-06-03T11:41:00.230Z -- YITH -- YITH WooCommerce Wishlist
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in YITH YITH WooCommerce Wishlist allows Stored XSS.This issue affects YITH WooCommerce Wishlist: from n/a through 3.32.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-27994|2024-03-21T15:03:11.763Z -- YITH -- YITH WooCommerce Product Add-Ons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in YITH YITH WooCommerce Product Add-Ons allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects YITH WooCommerce Product Add-Ons: from n/a through 4.5.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-32699|2024-04-24T15:00:57.371Z -- YITH -- YITH WooCommerce Compare
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in YITH YITH WooCommerce Compare.This issue affects YITH WooCommerce Compare: from n/a through 2.37.0.
